title: Apple dominated the tablet market in 2021, despite iPad shortages amid supply constraints
content:
New data by Canalys on the personal computer and tablet market shows that shipments in the US grew 1% in 2021. Shipments totaled a whopping 135 million units all year.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple dominated the tablet market in 2021, despite iPad shortages amid supply constraints appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: New data by Canalys on the personal computer and tablet market shows that shipments in the US grew 1% in 2021, totaling 135 million units.
